qualifications.title: Specialist Contractor (Demolition)
qualifications.description: The Specialist Contractor (Demolition) certification is issued to companies operating in the Specialist field by Construction Industry Council.

qualifications.title: Architectural Design Firm
qualifications.description: The Architectural Design Firm certification is issued to companies operating in the Architectural field by Hong Kong Institute of Architects.

qualifications.title: Building Materials Supplier Certification
qualifications.description: The Building Materials Supplier Certification certification is issued to companies operating in the Building field by Buildings Department, HKSAR Government.

qualifications.title: Green Building Design Certification
qualifications.description: The Green Building Design Certification certification is issued to companies operating in the Green field by Construction Industry Council.

qualifications.title: Safety Management Certification
qualifications.description: The Safety Management Certification certification is issued to companies operating in the Safety field by Hong Kong Institute of Architects.
